thread.title: Inspired Kitchen Design Marks 2,500th IKEA® Kitchen Design Online
thread.title_full: Inspired Kitchen Design Marks 2,500th IKEA® Kitchen Design Online

author: Jenn Whinnem
title: Inspired Kitchen Design Marks 2,500th IKEA® Kitchen Design Online
text:
Inspired Kitchen Design (IKD), the leading global IKEA kitchen design firm since 2008, today announced the sale of their 2,500th design for customers in the U.S., Canada, Europe, and Australia who require help with their IKEA kitchen plans. IKD is an eight-person team of professional kitchen designers who provide custom designs online for people who want to purchase an IKEA kitchen for their homes. Of the 2,500 IKD designs, 98 percent of customers are based in the U.S. and Canada.
“Worldwide, our clients seek out IKD for help using IKEA’s often-confusing kitchen planning tool,” said Michael Toth, Inspired Kitchen Design CEO/founder and one of the leading authorities in kitchen and bath design for almost 30 years. “Our team of experts does more than just fill in the Home Planner for our customers. The IKD team applies their years of kitchen design experience to bring their kitchens to life.”
IKEA kitchens and furniture are extremely popular around the globe. IKEA Group (INGKA Holding B.V. and its controlled entities) reported a net profit of €3.3 billion (approximately 3.7B USD) in their Fiscal Year 2014 report.
“In spite of IKEA’s appeal for the do-it-yourself crowd, we’ve found that our customers end up wasting a lot of their time trying to put together a kitchen using IKEA’s Home Planner,” said Toth. “When they hire IKD, we get them back on schedule with a design that just works.”
How Inspired Kitchen Design Works
IKD offers two levels of engagement for customers needing help with their IKEA kitchen designs. All customers receive:
An online consultation with a first design draft being emailed in 3 business days
Two free revisions to the design
A 3D, high-resolution, full-color rendering of the final kitchen design so they know how their kitchen will look in their home
Detailed drawings with cabinet and wall measurements so they know where everything will go in their new kitchen
Fewer trips to the IKEA store, thanks to the 100 percent complete shopping list IKD creates that the Home Planner can’t create
See what Inspired Kitchen Design has done for 2,500 IKEA kitchens worldwide on the IKD online portfolio .
About Inspired Kitchen Design
Inspired Kitchen Design (IKD) has created 2,500 IKEA kitchen designs completely online since 2008. Aside from avoiding the Home Planner, all customers receive and love the high-resolution color renderings, detailed drawings with cabinet and wall measurements, and the complete shopping list they get from IKD. IKEA® is a registered trademark of Inter-IKEA Systems B.V. and is in no way affiliated with Inspired Kitchen Design.
Houzz.com , the leading online platform for home remodeling and design, awarded IKD the Best of Houzz 2014 and 2015 badges for customer service. Most recently IKD was awarded the Influencer and Recommended Houzz badges.
For all media inquiries, please contact Jenn Whinnem, Outreach Manager, at jenn(at)inspiredkitchendesign(dot)com or visit https://inspiredkitchendesign.com/press-info/ .
